home.heroDescription: Discover authentic Cusco through experiences that connect with ancient Andean wisdom.
home.serviceRoutesDesc: Treks and hikes through sacred landscapes and ancestral trails
home.serviceCommunityDesc: Immersion in authentic Andean communities and living traditions
home.serviceCeremoniesDesc: Rituals and ceremonies with local spiritual masters
home.whyLocalDesc: Cusco natives with deep ancestral knowledge
home.whyAuthenticDesc: Real connection with communities and living traditions

about.title: About Us
about.historyText: Jaguar Llaqta was born from a deep love for our Cusco land and the desire to share its true essence with travelers from around the world. We are a team of local guides, historians and connoisseurs of Andean traditions.
about.visionText: To be the bridge between conscious travelers and the ancestral wisdom of the Andes, preserving and sharing our culture for future generations.
about.missionText: To offer alternative tourism experiences that connect our visitors with the essence of Cusco, generating a positive impact on local communities and promoting the preservation of our traditions.
about.objectiveOne: Promote sustainable and responsible tourism in the Cusco region.
about.objectiveTwo: Preserve and share ancestral Andean traditions with visitors from around the world.
about.objectiveThree: Generate a positive economic impact on local communities.
about.objectiveFour: Create transformative experiences that connect body, mind and spirit.
about.authenticityDesc: Genuine experiences connected with our culture
about.respectDesc: For our communities, traditions and nature
about.commitmentDesc: To the preservation of ancestral heritage
about.teamText: Our team of local guides and collaborators, committed to offering authentic experiences.
about.organizationsText: We work hand in hand with local communities, spiritual masters and organizations committed to sustainable tourism.

activities.title: Activities & Services
activities.subtitle: Discover our experiences designed to connect you with the essence of Cusco
activities.categoryRutasDesc: Treks and hikes through sacred trails, snow-capped mountains and ancestral valleys. Adventures that connect you with the majesty of the Andes.
activities.categoryComunidadDesc: Visits to authentic communities, traditional textile workshops, Andean gastronomy and living with local families.
activities.categoryCeremoniasDesc: Ceremonies with Andean masters, Pachamama offering rituals, meditation in sacred places and connection with the Andean worldview.

packages.title: Packages
packages.subtitle: Experiences designed for you
packages.privateDesc: Exclusive personalized experiences for you and your group. Maximum flexibility and personalized attention.
packages.groupDesc: Join other travelers in shared experiences. Meet people from around the world while exploring.
packages.customDesc: Tell us your dream and we'll make it happen. We design the perfect experience based on your interests.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: All our packages include specialized local guide, transportation, specified meals and all activities detailed in the itinerary.
faq.a2: We accept credit/debit card payments through Stripe, bank transfers and PayPal.
faq.a3: Cancellations up to 7 days before: full refund. 3-7 days: 50% refund. Less than 3 days: no refund.
faq.q4: Do I need to be in good physical condition?
faq.a4: It depends on the activity. Trekking routes require moderate physical condition, while cultural and spiritual experiences are suitable for everyone.
faq.q5: Are tours in groups or private?
faq.a5: We offer both options. You can join small groups or book an exclusive private experience.

footer.tagline: Connecting travelers with the ancestral wisdom of the Andes
